ComicInfo.Title: Bank Notes; Alley Ooops
ComicInfo.Summary:
Rock and Bowl! The Peanuts gang is headed to the bowling alley, and no one wants to win that coveted tournament trophy like Charlie Brown! If you're looking for laughs, this issue is a full strike!
Ask your retailer about the Franklin 1st appearance variant cover!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 16:42:59. [CVDB395333]
ComicInfo.Writer: Charles M. Schulz, Nat Gertler, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charles M. Schulz, Stephanie Gladden, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Inker: Charles M. Schulz, Justin Thompson, Paige Braddock
ComicInfo.Colorist: Art Roche, Lisa Moore, Nina Taylor Kester
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Charles M. Schulz, Emily Chang, Nina Taylor Kester, Paige Braddock, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Galer, Matt Gagnon, Shannon Watters
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie Brown, Franklin, Linus van Pelt, Peppermint Patty, Snoopy, Woodstock
